metadata.source_note: This JSON defines form metadata and class labels used by the AI classifier.

drivers_license_renewal.name: Driver's Licence Renewal
drivers_license_renewal.notes: Use when renewing a Jamaican driver's licence that is active or recently expired.

vehicle_registration_renewal.name: Motor Vehicle Registration Renewal
vehicle_registration_renewal.agency: Tax Administration Jamaica (TAJ) / Island Traffic Authority (ITA)
required_documents: Valid Motor Vehicle Fitness Certificate (if required)
vehicle_registration_renewal.notes: Use when the user uploads a motor vehicle registration certificate or sticker.

vehicle_title_application.name: Application for Motor Vehicle Title
vehicle_title_application.notes: Use when the user is applying for or replacing a motor vehicle title.

trn_application.name: Tax Registration Number Application
required_documents: Proof of identity (e.g., birth certificate, passport)
trn_application.notes: Use when the model detects a TRN card or TRN application-related document.

national_id_application.name: National Identification Card Application
required_documents: Supporting identity documents (e.g., birth certificate, TRN)
national_id_application.notes: Use when the model detects a state or national ID card-related document.
